column4: Hmm... I have many questions, having just switched to Ubuntu...
the package selection is minimal, there are lots of ways to customize it
give it some love, in time you'll see how well thought it is
once you get the hang of 'linux', it's all consistent
you thought you were ranting to help desk staff?
you can customize that, i guess... along with anything else
some people call it 'clean'. but that's just the default theme... go to system -> preferences -> appearance
I like it, but when you move it, it sort of "slugs" around.
Hehe... nah. Not like that. I mean internal GUI elements.
oh. well, it's just gtk... and you probably are running on crappy video drivers
